body: ( 0s ) Victoria Regina: Assistant:	Please wait while we are loading the chatbot for best experience.Assistant:	Hi Victoria. I'm Arlo, your virtual assistant here to help.		We may monitor or retain chat for quality assurance. By proceeding, you agree to our Terms of Service | Privacy NoticeAssistant:	Would you like to try and resolve the issue yourself or speak with an agent?User:	Speak with an agentUser:	Form Submission		Category: Cameras		Subcategory: Essential Cameras		Product: Arlo Essential 2 Outdoor 2K - VMC3050Assistant:	Please clarify/restate the question that I was not able to address, so the Arlo expert can review.User:	Trying to set up cameras for the first time. One camera spotlight went on during setup and will not go offAssistant:	I'll send the following details to an Arlo Expert to review.Name: VictoriaEmail: vregina0428@gmail.comProduct Name: Arlo Essential 2 Outdoor 2K (VMC3050)Question: Trying to set up cameras for the first time. One camera spotlight went on during setup and will not go offAssistant:	Please wait while as I check on a few thingsChat Started: Wednesday, June 11, 2025, 11:26:43 (-0700)Chat Origin: 02 NPI - HelpCenter Chat QueueAgent Rohith V( 5s ) Arlo Support: Dear Victoria Regina, Welcome!( 15s ) Arlo Support: Hi! Thank you for choosing Arlo, Victoria! My name is Rohith. How are you doing today? I hope you don’t mind giving me 2 minutes to review your account and your conversation with our chat bot.( 28s ) Victoria Regina: Having a hard time setting up one camera( 1m 21s ) Arlo Support: Hi, Victoria. Thank you for staying connected.( 1m 32s ) Arlo Support: Upon checking I understand you are facing trouble setting up one camera to your account. I am sorry for the trouble that you are facing not to worry I will check and assist you with this.( 1m 36s ) Arlo Support: Before proceeding could you please help me with the phone number to complete your account?( 2m 2s ) Victoria Regina: 732 616 5313( 2m 21s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for providing the phone number.( 2m 30s ) Arlo Support: Could you please help me with the serial number of the camera that you are facing issue with?( 2m 35s ) Arlo Support: Based on the camera model the serial number will be located. kindly use the below mentioned kb link for your reference.https://kb.arlo.com/000062026/Where-can-I-find-the-serial-number-and-firmware-version-for-my-Arlo-device( 2m 43s ) Arlo Support: To set the right expectations on this, if you are chatting with us from Arlo app, please make a note of the below steps to get back to this chat conversation:Open the Arlo app>> Click on the Profile icon>> Click on Support center>> Click on Support request case in progress; "Case number 44881612">> Click on Contact support>> Click on Chat with an agent.( 4m 44s ) Arlo Support: Hi Victoria, are we still connected? I am still here to give you assistance regarding your concern. Hopefully, you can still respond to this conversation.( 5m 17s ) Victoria Regina: Yes( 5m 23s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for confirming.( 5m 40s ) Arlo Support: May I know if you can able to get the serial number for the camera?( 5m 53s ) Victoria Regina: Looking for it( 6m 4s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for confirming.( 6m 39s ) Victoria Regina: Af524277e1cd6( 6m 48s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for sharing the serial number.( 7m 11s ) Arlo Support: Upon checking I could see that it is esential gen 2 camera.( 7m 25s ) Victoria Regina: Yup( 7m 28s ) Arlo Support: Don't worry, I will help you to fix the issue.( 7m 37s ) Arlo Support: May I know, if you are available with the device to perform troubleshooting?( 7m 50s ) Victoria Regina: Yes( 7m 56s ) Arlo Support: Perfect.( 7m 57s ) Arlo Support: May I know the network provider that you are using to connect the Arlo devices?( 8m 18s ) Victoria Regina: Optimum( 8m 25s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for confirming.( 8m 25s ) Arlo Support: Have you tried any troubleshooting steps before contacting Arlo support?( 9m 34s ) Victoria Regina: The other cameras setup correctly. This is not connected to my phone or WiFi.( 9m 36s ) Arlo Support: I am sorry to know that, we will work together to add the camera.( 9m 39s ) Arlo Support: Kindly bring the camera near the WiFi router then press and hold the sync button for 1-2 seconds and let me know the LED status of the camera.( 10m 26s ) Victoria Regina: The flood light will not shut off( 10m 40s ) Arlo Support: I will help you with that.( 11m 0s ) Arlo Support: May I know if you got blue LED on the camera after pressed the sync button for 1-2 seconds?( 11m 47s ) Victoria Regina: Light went out( 12m 49s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for confirming.( 12m 56s ) Arlo Support: Have you got blue LED on the camera?( 12m 58s ) Victoria Regina: Still not connected( 13m 15s ) Victoria Regina: It just went off( 13m 33s ) Arlo Support: Now kindly reset the camera using below mentioned steps and let me know the LED behavior,-Press and hold the Pairing Button on the top of the camera for 15 seconds.-When the camera LED starts blinking amber, release the Pairing Button to trigger a factory reset.( 14m 37s ) Victoria Regina: Done( 14m 52s ) Arlo Support: May I know the LED on the camera after reset?( 15m 18s ) Victoria Regina: Went blue for 5 sec then went off( 15m 42s ) Arlo Support: May I know if you got amber LED before blue LED?( 15m 51s ) Victoria Regina: Yes( 15m 55s ) Arlo Support: Great, now kindly follow the below steps on your mobile and let me know:1. Turn off Cellular Data2. Open WiFi settings on your phone and forget the connected network and reconnect to the same network ("2.4GHz only").3. Above 30% charge on mobile phone5. Turn on bluetooth( 18m 13s ) Arlo Support: Hi Victoria, are we still connected? I am still here to give you assistance regarding your concern. Hopefully, you can still respond to this conversation.( 19m 28s ) Arlo Support: Please let us know if you are still online. It's been almost 3 minutes since your last response. As much as I wish to stay, we have to give way to other customers waiting for support. Just in case there is no response from you within the next 2 minutes, I'll have to disconnect the session from my end. We hope you understand.( 21m 35s ) Arlo Support: Since we're not getting any response for the past 5 minutes, I'm sorry but I have to disconnect the chat now.As soon as I close this interaction, I will send you an email for your reference and documentation. This case will remain open within the next 7 days. If you need to follow through, you can continue our conversation through the Support Center in your Arlo Secure App or through your e-mail address. Moreover, feel free to utilize the self-help articles within the app. You can also check https://kb.arlo.com/ for more instructions that may help.Once again, my name is  Rohith. Thank you for choosing Arlo. I wish you have a great day!

By proceeding, you agree to our Terms of Service | Privacy NoticeAssistant:	Would you like to try and resolve the issue yourself or speak with an agent?User:	Speak with an agentAssistant:	Just to confirm, it looks like you're asking about the same device you selected previously, the front porch,door VMC2060. Is that correct?User:	YesAssistant:	I'll send the following details to an Arlo Expert to review.Name: BridgettEmail: bridgettnelson11@gmail.comProduct Name: Arlo Essential 2 Indoor FHD (VMC2060)Question: both of my devices keep the privacy shield up and will not stay steady viewing/recording. I just updated to the premium plan but it did not make a difference. please helpAssistant:	Please wait while as I check on a few thingsChat Started: Wednesday, June 11, 2025, 23:12:04 (-0700)Chat Origin: 02 NPI - HelpCenter Chat QueueAgent Muthu P( 4s ) Arlo Support: Dear Bridgett Sinclair, Welcome!( 13s ) Arlo Support: Hi! Thank you for choosing Arlo, Bridgett! My name is Muthu. How are you doing today? I hope you don’t mind giving me 2 minutes to review your account and your conversation with our chat bot.( 17s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Thank you for responding so quickly( 31s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Nice to meet you.( 1m 3s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for staying connected. Bridgett( 1m 15s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Not a problem( 1m 23s ) Arlo Support: To ensure that when the motion is detected the sheild is not opening?( 3m 11s ) Bridgett Sinclair: When I first got the system, the free trial gave me constant 24/7 live feed/recording. I subscribed because I love the products and the security it gives. But it does not stay live viewing or recording and the shield stays up unless I click on the device to live stream. How do I get it to live stream and record 24/7 again( 3m 16s ) Arlo Support: I am really sorry to hear that, let me check and help you with details.( 3m 17s ) Arlo Support: May I please have your full name and phone number for verification purpose?( 3m 33s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Bridgett Sinclair 9123218506( 3m 35s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for confirming. Bridgett( 3m 49s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Any time.( 3m 52s ) Arlo Support: Just to make sure, if you are available in device location now?( 4m 0s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Yes( 4m 7s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for confirming. You're in good hands! I'll do my best to assist you with your concern.( 4m 23s ) Arlo Support: Could you please give me a 2-3 minutes to check and help you with details?( 4m 30s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Yes( 6m 24s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for your patience. Bridgett( 6m 26s ) Arlo Support: Please note that to view recordings 24/7 you need to purchase the CVR plan. However, as per checking the device details mode shows as Arm home and no rules were created and that is the reason you are facing issue with recordings and live stream. In this case, please change the mode to Arm away and then check if you are able to view the live stream and wave your hand infront of the camera to check if you are getting recordings. Launch the Arlo Secure App or log in to my.arlo.com.Tap or click Dashboard.Tap or click Arm Away( 6m 34s ) Arlo Support: I request you to reply back to this chat within 3-5 minutes to continue further troubleshooting.You can get back to this chat by selecting Profile icon > Support center > Support request case in progress: 44883772>Contact support with chat icon > Select chat with an agent.( 8m 56s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Thank you!( 9m 8s ) Bridgett Sinclair: I’ll try that now and get back to you to let you know( 9m 10s ) Arlo Support: To ensure that if you are able to view the live stream?( 9m 17s ) Arlo Support: Sure. Once done, please let me know.( 9m 18s ) Bridgett Sinclair: How much is the cvr plan?( 10m 0s ) Arlo Support: Please check with below CVR plan price details: 14 days- $14.99/- USD per camera30 days- $29.99/- USD per camera( 11m 12s ) Bridgett Sinclair: It works like you said! Thank you!( 11m 20s ) Arlo Support: Glad to know that!!( 11m 23s ) Bridgett Sinclair: How do I change to the plan?( 11m 26s ) Arlo Support: Can I close this case with your permission and sent you a survey email to rate my service?( 11m 43s ) Arlo Support: I understand your concern but unfortunately, I am unable to assist you further on the billing-related issue as you have reached the technical team. I request you to contact the billing team through the Arlo app by selecting the settings > support > Subscription > then choose the preferred support channel. You can reach them by 6AM-6PM PST.( 11m 53s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Yes. Thank you!( 11m 55s ) Arlo Support: Please let me know if you have any other concerns that I can assist you with!( 12m 3s ) Bridgett Sinclair: Have a good evening( 12m 16s ) Arlo Support: I have closed the case. To ensure that have you received the survey email?

The other 2 purchased at the same time, does work.Assistant:	Please wait while as I check on a few thingsChat Started: Tuesday, June 10, 2025, 13:29:13 (-0700)Chat Origin: 02 NPI - HelpCenter Chat QueueAgent Sandhiya R( 5s ) Arlo Support: Dear S.J. Hicks, Welcome!( 17s ) Arlo Support: Hi! Thank you for choosing Arlo, S.J.! My name is Sandhiya. How are you doing today? I hope you don’t mind giving me 2 minutes to review your account and your conversation with our chat bot.( 2m 5s ) S.J. Hicks: I'll wait then. It's not the same camera as of last time. A new camera with more battery power with the same name.( 3m 13s ) S.J. Hicks: The one you checked last time has a different name now.( 3m 47s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for giving me time to review the information that we have. Just to verify, based on the chatbot, you’re contacting us today because you need help withno recording issue. Is that correct?( 3m 53s ) Arlo Support: I'm sorry to hear about what happened. I appreciate you letting me know and allowing me to address this issue. Not to worry; I will do my best to help you sort this out.( 4m 0s ) Arlo Support: For validation purposes, please confirm the phone number.( 4m 15s ) S.J. Hicks: 803 629 6161( 5m 11s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for providing the phone number.( 5m 21s ) Arlo Support: Could you please share the name you have provided for this camera?( 5m 44s ) S.J. Hicks: Dinner time at night( 6m 18s ) Arlo Support: Thanks for the details.( 6m 42s ) Arlo Support: How long have you been facing this issue?( 7m 40s ) S.J. Hicks: It was activated 4 days ago. Has not recorded at all for the 30 day period.( 8m 6s ) S.J. Hicks: Even when it's armed at night.( 8m 17s ) Arlo Support: I have real quickly reviewed your account and found the reason for which the cameras are not recording.( 8m 22s ) Arlo Support: I assure you that it will be resolved in a fraction of minute.( 8m 54s ) S.J. Hicks: Waiting on this end.( 9m 5s ) Arlo Support: Upon reviewing your account, I could see that you have selected the mode Standby whereas there are no rules for the camera to detect motion and record the videos.( 9m 15s ) Arlo Support: To get this sorted out all you need is to:Open the Arlo app > tap on dashboard > then select the mode as Arm away.( 9m 34s ) Arlo Support: Please let me know once you changed the current mode to Arm Away to guide you further in this.( 11m 32s ) Arlo Support: Hi S.J., are we still connected? I am still here to give you assistance regarding your concern. Hopefully, you can still respond to this conversation.( 11m 44s ) S.J. Hicks: It is armed at night for the last 3 nights, and didnotrecord. Right now it's on standby so it won't record while we are walking by them.( 12m 10s ) S.J. Hicks: Shall I arm on this end for you to check.( 12m 25s ) Arlo Support: I can compltely understand your concern. Let's try by changing the mode now and check it.( 13m 25s ) S.J. Hicks: Without losing your conversation,  how do I go back and arm it without losing you.( 13m 54s ) Arlo Support: To minimize on this chat window, if you are chatting with us from Arlo app, please make a note of the below steps to get back to this chat conversation:Open the Arlo app>> Click on the Profile icon>> Click on Support center>> Click on Support request case in progress; "44879708">> Click on Contact support>> Click on Chat with an agent. Kindly take a screenshot of the above steps; if you got disconnected in the middle of the chat, you can use the above steps to connect back to us.( 14m 4s ) Arlo Support: Please let me know once you note down the above chat come back steps.( 14m 28s ) Arlo Support: Kindly minimize on this chat window and try to change the mode.( 14m 53s ) S.J. Hicks: Okay, will do.( 15m 33s ) Arlo Support: Thank you.( 17m 6s ) Arlo Support: I could see that you have successfully changed the mode to Arm away.( 17m 12s ) Arlo Support: That's really super quick and you are really awesome.( 17m 20s ) Arlo Support: Now kindly try waving the hand in front of the cameras then check if they are recording the videos.( 18m 56s ) S.J. Hicks: This particular camera is 25 miles away at my other residence.( 19m 8s ) Arlo Support: Is there anyone available in the device location to check for the motion detection in front of the camera to check for its performance?( 19m 28s ) S.J. Hicks: Not currently at this time.( 19m 39s ) Arlo Support: But don't worry, everything seems to be perfect for now.( 19m 52s ) Arlo Support: We made it smoother and perfect in order to resolve your concern.( 20m 24s ) Arlo Support: Not to worry, I will keep this case open for you and update the case notes.( 20m 31s ) S.J. Hicks: Okay, we'll check later and keep the # to chat later if there is a problem.( 20m 51s ) Arlo Support: I really appreciate your understanding and coopertaion in this.( 21m 0s ) Arlo Support: I am glad, I was able to resolve your query in the first chat instance. You will receive a survey to rate my service.( 21m 7s ) Arlo Support: With your permission, shall I close this case?( 21m 9s ) S.J. Hicks: Done for now then. Later( 21m 25s ) S.J. Hicks: Yes, and thanks.( 21m 49s ) Arlo Support: You’ve reached us regarding the no recording issue and I have provided you with the required information and resolved your concern. Apart from that is there anything else that I can help you with?( 22m 13s ) S.J. Hicks: Not right now, thanks.( 22m 16s ) Arlo Support: I have shared the Knowledge Based article along with the survey email. It will only take few seconds of your time to rate the support conversation that I had with you today. We at Arlo, thank you in trusting us with your business!( 22m 21s ) Arlo Support: Kindly rate your survey and feedback in order to enhance my skills and techniques to assist other customers.( 22m 37s ) Arlo Support: A survey to your email address, mdshad2@aol.com. I would really appreciate it if you took the time to rate the support and service I have provided you today.( 22m 44s ) Arlo Support: It was nice chatting with you and it means a lot, thank you so much.( 23m 2s ) Arlo Support: Thank you for contacting Arlo technical support have a great and blessed day ahead.( 23m 13s ) Arlo Support: You are welcome and it is an immense pleasure to assist you with this.( 23m 29s ) S.J. Hicks: I'll do the survey, thanks for the quick response to resolve the issue.( 24m 0s ) Arlo Support: So kind of you, S.J. Hicks. Have a great day with your loved ones.( 24m 10s ) Arlo Support: Once again, my name is Sandhiya. Thank you for trusting Arlo. I wish you have a great day! 😊
